entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Victoria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 10:50 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: WNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain this afternoon then to rain later this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 20 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Haro Strait. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
